entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
